Writer: Alice Addison (screenplay), Wain Fimeri (original adaptation), Daniel Nettheim (original adaptation), Julia Leigh (based on the novel by)
Title: The Hunter
Actors: Willem Dafoe, Frances O'Connor, Sam Neill, Morgana Davies
Plot: Martin, a mercenary, is sent from Europe by a mysterious biotech company to the Tasmanian wilderness on a hunt for the last Tasmanian tiger.
